programme.title: Acts of Vengeance
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer transforms his body and takes a vow of silence, not to be broken until he finds out who killed his wife and daughter and has his revenge.

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Sam Childers (Gerard Butler), a former biker, travels to Africa to establish an orphanage for young victims of war.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: A hitman who's in Bangkok to pull off a series of jobs violates his personal code when he falls for a local woman and bonds with his errand boy.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Two unseen scientists manipulate the gory goings-on at a backwoods cabin inhabited by a group of unsuspecting college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison).

programme.title: Firewalker
programme.desc: Two guys (Chuck Norris, Louis Gossett Jr.) and a girl (Melody Anderson) brave jungle hazards to find an Aztec temple filled with gold.

programme.title: El Rey's Top 5
programme.desc: Danielle Perez and Danielle Radford list their Top 5 midnight snacks.

programme.title: El Rey's Top 5
programme.desc: Danielle Radford and Zena Dixon list their top five urban legends.

programme.title: El Rey's Top 5
programme.desc: Host Vanessa Gritton and her guests Danielle Radford and Zena Dixon list their top five zombie apocalypse gear.

programme.title: El Rey's Top 5
programme.sub-title: Top 5 As Seen on TV Products
programme.desc: Vanessa is joined by Danielle Perez and Ed Greer.

programme.title: 200 mph
programme.desc: After his older brother's death, a young amateur racer plunges into the world of illegal street-racing to get revenge.

programme.title: Boost
programme.desc: A man is thrust into a violent underworld after he finds a package in the trunk of a stolen car.

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: With his job at stake, a tech-savvy employee (Liam Hemsworth) has to infiltrate a competitor's company and steal trade secrets for his ruthless boss (Gary Oldman).

programme.title: For Greater Glory
programme.desc: In the 1920s, the Mexican government's attempt to secularize the country sparks a rebellion known as the Cristero War.

programme.title: The Cold Light of Day
programme.desc: A vacation in Spain turns nightmarish when a man's (Henry Cavill) family is kidnapped by agents who are hell-bent on recovering a mysterious briefcase.

programme.title: Romeo Is Bleeding
programme.desc: A double life catches up to a New York policeman (Gary Oldman) when he meets a mob hit-woman (Lena Olin) from Moscow.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: A hitman who's in Bangkok to pull off a series of jobs violates his personal code when he falls for a local woman and bonds with his errand boy.

programme.title: Acts of Violence
programme.desc: A man teams up with his ex-military brothers and a detective to save his kidnapped fiancee from human traffickers.
